heroDescription: Welcome! I'm Chris McIntosh, the creator of httpstack – a revolutionary project designed to simplify web development. httpstack empowers you to build stunning web components, designs, forms, and even entire web pages, either from AI-generated suggestions or pre-built presets. It intelligently breaks down every element into its core HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, giving you unparalleled control and clarity.
heroCtaLabel: For Potential Employers: View My Resume
